channel.description: Creamy Jalepeno Sauce 1 cup vegan mayo 1 tsp onion powder 1 tsp garlic powder 1 tsp smoked paprika 1 tsp chipotle powder 2 tbps pickled jalepeno brine 8 slices pickled jalepenos finely diced Can add citric acid or lime juice for more zip 2-4 tablespoons vegan sour cream Blend ingredients and add to sauce bottle.
